actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-231.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigation and study of the exploration and exploitation of the Outer Continental Shelf to be conducted by the Ad Hoc Select Committee on the Outer Continental Shelf.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 94-231) Provides that the expenses of a study of H.R. 6218, a bill to establish a policy for the management of oil and natural gas in the Outer Continental Shelf, to protect the marine and coastal environment, to be conducted by the ad hoc Select Committee on the Outer Continental Shelf, shall not exceed $150,000. Provides that no part of the funds authorized by this resolution shall be available for expenditure in connection with the study of any subject which is being investigated for the same purpose by any other committee of the House.

titles.title: Resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigation and study of the exploration and exploitation of the Outer Continental Shelf to be conducted by the Ad Hoc Select Committee on the Outer Continental Shelf.
